parameters.name: Conditions
parameters.description:
The rule conditions. The value is in the JSON format. Valid values of keys:

*   **condition**: the matching condition.
*   **type**: the matching type.
*   **value**: the matching value.

parameters.name: EventKey
parameters.description: The keyword of the alert item.

parameters.name: EventName
parameters.description: The name of the alert item.

parameters.name: EventType
parameters.description:
The alert type.

*   Set the value to **sensitiveFile**.

parameters.name: OperationCode
parameters.description:
The operation code.

*   Set the value to **whitelist** to add the alert item to the whitelist.

parameters.name: Scenarios
parameters.description:
The application scope of the rule. The value is in the JSON format. Valid values of keys:

*   **type**
*   **value**
